name: Tanshul Kumar
body:
### About Me.
I am a web/mobile application developer based in the Fiji Islands.

### Connect with me.

* Twitter - [@indian369](https://twitter.com/indian369)
* Blog - [blog.tanshul.com](blog.tanshul.com)
* LinkedIn - http://www.linkedin.com/in/tanshul

### Technologies i work with.

* Coldfusion
* Html5
* CSS
* Javascript
* Php (Wordpress)
* MySql
* Json
* Soap / XML

### Server technologies

* Coldfusion 9/10
* Railo
* Windows Server 2003 - 2008 R2
* IIS 
* Wamp

***

### Other Libraries / Software

* Boostrap
* AngularJS ( learning )

* Photoshop
* SqlYog
* DropBox

***

***

### Mobile
* Responsive layout
* Android Development
